Hope to see you all in ~20 mins 👀 Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Tomorrow @ 5pm UTC we're hosting an open discussion about D_Ds latest in flight proposal. Come hangout, listen and ask any questions of the proposal authors 🤝 https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1YpKkgjqPPZKj
